description: ff. 67. 210 x 150; 150 x 100 mm. 17 lin. Jumādá II, 1000. Abridgment of Ibn Qudāmahʼs work (same as Berlin 4504 and Garrett 1845) completed in Rajab 966; in Brockelmann, GAL, I, 503 (no. l, Ausz. a) and S I, 688 confused with the authorʼs al-Iqnāʻ. Incip.: ... الحمد لله حمدا لا ىنفد افضل ... اما بعد فهذا مختصر فى الفقه من المقنع
author: ḥujāwī, Mūsá ibn Aḥmad, d. 1560
title: Zād al-mustaqniʻ fī ikhtiṣar al-Muqniʻ.
creator: ḥujāwī, Mūsá ibn Aḥmad, d. 1560
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
